title: Please Add A Report Category For Scripting
body: I know there is a lot of people who falsely accuse people of scripting and I really dislike that. But in Diamond elo there's definitely a few going around. And just like every other category there will be false reports, but when I see a person I suspect of doing it at the moment I don't have an appropriate category to put the report in.

replies.body: Seeing them more and more. Instant qss scripts, cass and ori scripts...
